function.description: Returns a `string` containing all text extracted from (X)HTML `element` node(s) without any markup.

parameterDescriptions.parameterDescription: The web page(s) that will be converted.

function.longDescription:
Any HTML entities contained in the text, like the copyright symbol, will be converted to characters.
If a `page` variable is provided as an input, it looks for the `body` tag and returns the extracted text from all its children. This function supports (X)HTML content only. Generic XML content can be processed using XML.getText.

example.header: Extract text from a web page
